import sys


def euler_phi(x):
    i = 2
    factors = set([])
    ret = x
    while(i<=x):
        if (x%i == 0):
            factors.add(i)
            x = x / i
            i = 2
        else:
            i = i + 1
    #print factors
    for factor in factors:
        ret = (ret * (factor-1)) / factor
    return ret

t  = int(sys.stdin.readline())
for i in range(0,t):
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    print euler_phi(n)
